nodes.text: The Imperial Artillery Corps was a sub-unit of the Galactic Empire's Imperial Armor Corps that specialized in operating medium and heavy artillery pieces, which includes the 1.4 FD P-Tower, the Golan Arms SP.9, and the Self-Propelled Heavy Artillery Turbolaser.
The Imperial Artillery Corps was mentioned in Dawn of Rebellion, a roleplaying supplementary sourcebook for the Star Wars Roleplaying series that was published by Fantasy Flight Games in 2018.
